title: Kitāb Aḫbār Ṣiffīn fī aṣaḥḥ ar-riwāya wa-atammihā riwāya Muḥammad Ibn-Isḥaq wa-ʽUmar Ibn-Saʽīd wa-ġairihimā min al-ʽulamāʾ al-muḥaqqiqīn
creator: ʽAlī Ibn-ʽAbdallāh al-ʽAffārī [Schreiber],
subject: Außereuropäische Handschriften
source: ʽAlī Ibn-ʽAbdallāh al-ʽAffārī [Schreiber],: Kitāb Aḫbār Ṣiffīn fī aṣaḥḥ ar-riwāya wa-atammihā riwāya Muḥammad Ibn-Isḥaq wa-ʽUmar Ibn-Saʽīd wa-ġairihimā min al-ʽulamāʾ al-muḥaqqiqīn. Berlin
